typia.description: Run the Typia generator to create runtime type validators

esbuild.description: Run the esbuild build process on a selected project

unbuild.description: Run the unbuild build process on a selected project

clean-package.description: Remove configuration files, fields, and scripts for development before publishing package

size-limit.description: Run a size-limit performance test on the project

npm-publish.description: Publish a package to the NPM registry

cargo-publish.description: Publish a Rust crate to the crates.io registry

cargo-build.description: Build a Rust project with Cargo Build

cargo-check.description: Check a Rust project with Cargo Check

cargo-format.description: Format a Rust project with Cargo Fmt

cargo-clippy.description: Lint a Rust project with Cargo Clippy

cargo-doc.description: Create docs for a Rust project with Cargo Doc
